import './index.css' const CounterItem = props => { const {commentDetails} = props const {id, name, comment, isLiked, initialClassName} = commentDetails const initial = name ? name[0].toUpperCase() : '' const likeTextClassName = isLiked ? 'button active' : 'button' const onClickLike = () => { const {toggleIsLiked} = props toggleIsLiked(id) } const onDeleteComment = () => { const {deleteComment} = props deleteComment(id) } return (

  • {initial}

    {name}
